title: Honour Orbs
body:
As of writing this post, i'd just hit the 2nd checkpoint in honour 3.
Now supposedly these honour orbs were meant to give some "decent rewards" (i put that lightly as its never stated as to what we'd get in terms of quantity)

But upon opening it, I received 2 key fragments and 150 blue ess.
Now it may just be me, but i honestly find that to be a little.... Lacking?
The blue ess I dont really care for as i get it from champ caps, but only 2 key frags and nothing else? I get more key frags when logging in after a day of receiving many honours.
Have to admit I'm a little disappointed.

replies.body:
https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor

It was announced with the honour changes what exactly would be in the orbs. They are meant to be 'decent rewards' yes but more than that they are meant to be guaranteed rewards. There was a lot of RNG last season with who got honour capsules. Some people got loads, and some got barely any. 

They wanted to fix that, So they moved away from RNG and instead added checkpoints with guaranteed rewards, both for that purpose and as an additional measure of progression (since it takes longer this season since we have the whole year).
